column3: No idea what caused this error.\nI edited the value in Visual Studio Code and saved it. This is the console output during the process: https://pastebin.com/FCCEHdjt. You can see I initially merged the branch to my master and pushed it, instead of pushing the branch directlyâ€”which I did afterward.

Unsure about this...

1) Running this commit, the initial displayed value is `30min`, when I slider forth and back to the same position, it states `12h` (bug).
2) Using a `12h` window makes the graph black for a minute or so (including the grid) which is non-ideal for a user feedback (probably acceptable since not directly related to this change).

@jonasschnelli 
To be a nitpicker:
1. `30 m` and `12 h` [in case someone tries to ctrl+f 'min']
2. ~53 seconds.

Anyway, I agree that both consequences are annoying; the former being unacceptable.

> * Using a `12h` window makes the graph black for a minute or so (including the grid) which is non-ideal for a user feedback (probably acceptable since not directly related to this change).\n\nThis behavior is observed on master branch too.
There doesn't seem to be agreement on doing this and the PR has been inactive for months, closing.
